page.title: 13A Uyeasound Musician.
page.content: Most Uyeasound musicians play the fiddle but my Mum plays the double bass with the Shetland Fiddlers. She has been with the Shetland Fiddlers for four years although she has played the bass for thirteen years,since she taught herself.The Shetland Fiddlers leader asked her to join them when they needed a bass player.They practice in Lerwick each Wednesday evening but the travelling distance means Mum only gets to two out of three of the practices. The Shetland Fiddlers play at Shetland concerts as well as making radio and T.V. appearances.They have also made records and appeared on the Hamefarin video.They also go on tour.In 1985 they will be playing at Keith in June and Islay in July.During summer they will play for tourists at the Summer Exhibition in Lerwick.
